mapper.update: update `agent` set password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, channel = #{channel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contact = #{contact,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, contactPhone = #{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, comment = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, balance = #{balance,jdbcType=INTEGER} where agentId = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select agentId, password, company, channel, contact, contactPhone, address, comment, balance from `agent` where agentId = #{agentId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select agentId, password, company, channel, contact, contactPhone, address, comment, balance from `agent`
